channel.title: Code To See Chat in Run Prompt?

item.title: Code To See Chat in Run Prompt?
item.dc:creator: @Bo_Scape Bo Scape
item.description:
@Bo_Scape wrote:

I’ve seen this done before… But i can’t seem to figure out how to do it. What I’m talking about is where a player in your server might type “hi” in the chat and then enter it. I want to be able to see what they said in my run prompt.
Here’s an example of a code that shows of in the prompt because of what a player had done.

[code]}

public void println_debug(String str, int ID, String Name) {
	System.out.println("[client-" + ID + "-" + Name + "]: " + str);
}[/code]

Any ideas how to make it show what they typed in the chat?
Thank you

EDIT:
The base is Anarchy Reloaded

Read full topic
item.source: Code To See Chat in Run Prompt?
